About the Company: Indian Hume Pipe Co. Ltd. (IHP) is engaged in the manufacturing, popularising and marketing of Hume Pipes and allied products.The company is actively involved in the strengthening of the nation`s infrastructure in varied fields viz. Water Supply, Irrigation, Drainage, Power Generation and Rail transport by executing numerous turnkey pipeline projects for Water Supply, Sewerage and Hydroelectric Power Generation and supplying millions of sleepers for railways in India.The product range of the company includes Prestressed concrete pipe,Prestressed concrete cylinder pipe,Bar wrapped steel cylinder pipe,Steel pipe,RCC pipe,Penstock pipe,Prestressed concrete monoblock sleeper for railways &Air rifles & pistols..The company also engagged in the business of Construction Contracts Including Water Supply Schemes, Pipes Supply & Laying Projects.
